items.sentence: Don\'t worry about it. Everything\'s going to be fine.

I had hardly opened my mouth, when she interrupted me.
Which wire should I cut, the red one or the white one?
You should try to make the most of your opportunities.
Your uncle and I have known each other for many years.
Tom never told me he didn\'t know how to speak French.
Tom often acts like a baby when he can\'t get his way.
I can barely remember what my grandfather looked like.
Tom filled the pot with water and put it on the stove.
Tom finally figured out where the treasure was hidden.
Tom finds it much easier to speak English than French.
Tom finds it much easier to speak French than English.
Tom finished reading the book and returned it to Mary.
Tom didn\'t seem to be as active as Mary seemed to be.
Tom didn\'t seem to be as greedy as Mary seemed to be.
Tom didn\'t seem to be as hungry as Mary seemed to be.
Tom didn\'t seem to be as sleepy as Mary seemed to be.
